stories.text:
Hi HN!

I'm looking to help a close friend that is low-income break into web development. I'm so used to working with a high-powered (and expensive) macbook , and I'm not sure what options are good for developing when the budget is tight.

Any recommendations for a good inexpensive dev setup?
stories.title: Ask HN: Any recommendations for an inexpensive developer machine?

stories.text: I know this question has been ask a few times, but I am at the point where I am contemplating leaving the tech industry.  I am not FIRE and I am old enough to know money isn't everything.  So I want to ask people that left, what tips you have for figuring out what to do next?
stories.title: Ask HN: What would you do if you were in tech?
